title: The Silence of the Lambs
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
Best Actress in a Leading Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
description: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten-year-old son John from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.

title: Beauty and the Beast
description: A prince cursed to spend his days as a hideous monster sets out to regain his humanity by earning a young woman's love.

title: JFK
description: New Orleans District Attorney Jim Garrison discovers there's more to the Kennedy assassination than the official story.

title: Thelma & Louise
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen
description: Two best friends set out on an adventure, but it soon turns into a terrifying escape from being hunted by the police, as these two girls escape for the crimes they committed.

title: Boyz n the Hood
description: Follows the lives of three young males living in the Crenshaw ghetto of Los Angeles, dissecting questions of race, relationships, violence, and future prospects.

title: Fried Green Tomatoes
description: A housewife who is unhappy with her life befriends an old lady in a nursing home and is enthralled by the tales she tells of people she used to know.

title: The Fisher King
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: A former radio DJ, suicidally despondent because of a terrible mistake he made, finds redemption in helping a deranged homeless man who was an unwitting victim of that mistake.

title: Barton Fink
description: A renowned New York playwright is enticed to California to write for the movies and discovers the hellish truth of Hollywood.

title: Raise the Red Lantern
description: China in the 1920s. After her father's death, 19 year old Songlian is forced to marry Chen Zuoqian, the lord of a powerful family. Fifty year old Chen has already three wives, each of them living in a separate house within the great castle.

title: Delicatessen
description: Post-apocalyptic surrealist black comedy about the landlord of an apartment building who occasionally prepares a delicacy for his odd tenants.

title: The Double Life of Véronique
description: Two parallel stories about two identical women; one living in Poland, the other in France. They don't know each other, but their lives are nevertheless profoundly connected.

title: My Own Private Idaho
description: Two best friends living on the streets of Portland as hustlers embark on a journey of self discovery and find their relationship stumbling along the way.

title: Night on Earth
description: An anthology of 5 different cab drivers in 5 American and European cities and their remarkable fares on the same eventful night.

title: Point Break
description: An F.B.I. Agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.

title: Cape Fear
description: A convicted rapist, released from prison after serving a fourteen-year sentence, stalks the family of the lawyer who originally defended him.

title: The Commitments
description: Jimmy Rabbitte, an unemployed Dublin boy, decides to put together a soul band made up entirely of the Irish working class.

title: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
description: On the eve of retirement, Kirk and McCoy are charged with assassinating the Klingon High Chancellor and imprisoned. The Enterprise crew must help them escape to thwart a conspiracy aimed at sabotaging the last best hope for peace.

title: Defending Your Life
description: In an afterlife resembling the present-day US, people must prove their worth by showing in court how they have demonstrated courage.

title: The Doors
description: The story of the famous and influential 1960s rock band The Doors and its lead singer and composer, Jim Morrison, from his days as a UCLA film student in Los Angeles, to his untimely death in Paris, France at age 27 in 1971.

title: What About Bob?
description: A successful psychotherapist loses his mind after one of his most dependent patients, a highly manipulative obsessive-compulsive, tracks him down during his family vacation.

title: Dogfight
description: Before they leave for Vietnam, a group of Marines bet on who can bring the ugliest date to a party. One of them brings a shy waitress, but their night doesn't go as planned.

title: Homicide
description: A Jewish homicide detective investigating the murder of an elderly Jewish woman discovers a Zionist organization operating in the city.

title: Life Is Sweet
description: A working-class North London family deals with the ups and downs of everyday life, including the launch of a new business and the struggles of their two daughters.

title: Trust
description: A pregnant high school dropout bonds with an electronics repairman.

title: Riff-Raff
description: A construction worker finds work and romance in London, but struggles with the harsh realities of working class life.

title: Europa
description: An American of German descent arrives in post-war Germany to take a job as a sleeping car conductor.

title: Toto the Hero
description: An elderly man named Thomas reflects on his life, believing he was switched at birth with his wealthy neighbor Alfred, and plots his revenge.

title: Mediterraneo
description: In WWII, a group of Italian soldiers are stranded on a remote Greek island where they eventually bond with the locals and forget about the war.

title: Black Robe
description: In the 17th century, a Jesuit priest and a young companion are escorted through the wilderness of Quebec by Algonquin Indians to find a distant mission.

title: Hear My Song
description: To save his failing nightclub, a promoter heads to Ireland to find and book the legendary singer Josef Locke, who fled the UK decades earlier to escape tax evasion charges.

title: Enchanted April
description: Four English women, struggling with their dreary lives in 1920s London, rent a castle in Italy for a month of freedom and relaxation.

title: Proof
description: A blind photographer, who takes pictures to prove to himself that the world is really as others describe it, develops a complex relationship with a restaurant worker.

title: Paris Is Burning
description: A chronicle of New York's drag scene in the 1980s, focusing on balls, voguing and the ambitions and dreams of those who gave the era its warmth and vitality.

title: Hearts of Darkness: A Filmmaker's Apocalypse
description: A documentary that chronicles the production problems of Francis Ford Coppola's 'Apocalypse Now', including bad weather, actor health issues, and war.

title: Only Yesterday
description: A twenty-seven-year-old office worker travels to the countryside while reminiscing about her childhood in Tokyo.

title: Center Stage
description: A biopic of the silent film actress Ruan Lingyu, who committed suicide at age 24.

title: Once Upon a Time in China
description: Martial arts master Wong Fei-hung faces off against foreign forces plundering China and a local gang involved in human trafficking.

title: Armour of God II: Operation Condor
description: Asian Hawk (Jackie Chan) is hired to find 240 tons of gold stolen from the desert by Nazis during WWII.

title: Riki-Oh: The Story of Ricky
description: A young man with superhuman strength is incarcerated in a private prison where inmates are treated like slaves. He takes on the corrupt warden and his henchmen.

title: The Indian Runner
description: Two brothers, a small-town deputy and a violent ex-con, struggle to connect as they deal with their past and the changing world around them.

title: La Belle Noiseuse
description: A famous painter is inspired to return to a masterpiece he abandoned years ago when he meets a beautiful young woman who becomes his model.

title: Lovers on the Bridge
description: A homeless circus performer and a painter with failing eyesight form a romance while living on Paris's Pont Neuf bridge.

title: Tous les Matins du Monde
description: The story of Monsieur de Sainte-Colombe, a recluse musician, and his pupil, Marin Marais, in 17th century France.

title: Van Gogh
description: The last 67 days of painter Vincent van Gogh's life.

title: Jacquot de Nantes
description: Agnès Varda's tribute to her husband, director Jacques Demy, focusing on his childhood in Nantes and his love for cinema.

title: The Elementary School
description: In post-WWII Czechoslovakia, a strict schoolteacher with a reputation for discipline is assigned to a class of unruly boys.

title: Urga
description: A Mongolian shepherd living in Inner Mongolia meets a Russian truck driver who is stuck in the steppe.

title: High Heels
description: A news broadcaster murders her husband, who was once her mother's lover, and tries to reconnect with her mother who returns after a long absence.

title: City of Hope
description: The intersecting lives of residents in a fictional American city, exploring corruption, politics, and personal struggles.

title: Flirting
description: In 1965 Australia, a young boy at a strict boys' boarding school falls in love with a girl from a nearby girls' school.

title: The Man in the Moon
description: A coming-of-age story about a young girl in 1950s rural Louisiana who falls in love with her older neighbor.

title: Rhapsody in August
description: An elderly woman living in Nagasaki takes care of her four grandchildren over their summer holidays. They learn about the atomic bomb that fell in 1945 and how it killed their grandfather.
